EmailTemplate.name: MMScriptManagerRejectionNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Script {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by Manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.OwnerFirstName},
The script - {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by manager - {!User.Manager}. You need to rework on the script and resend the script for approval.
Sincerely, ADvendio Team
